doc.after: Albert Einstein was born in Ulm, in the Kingdom of WÃ¼rttemberg in the German Empire on 14Â March 1879.[15] His parents were Hermann Einstein, a salesman and engineer, and Pauline Koch. In 1880, the family moved to Munich, where his father and his uncle founded Elektrotechnische Fabrik J. Einstein & Cie, a company that manufactured electrical equipment based on direct current.[15]
